duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in requirements formulation, design, prototype, develop, and document the software applications and ensure the solutions meet all requirements.
Help determine technical direction for multiple projects to streamline workflow efficiencies.
Responsible for creating brand new solutions with support to meet business process needs.
Communicate with senior internal and external customers and vendors.
Design, develop, test, debug, and implement operating systems components, software tools, and utilities.
Determine systems software design requirements and ensure that system improvements are successfully implemented and monitored to increase efficiency.
Generate systems software engineering policies, standards, and procedures.
